p: Host seeking Ae. aegypti mosquitoes were collected from Mombasa, Kisumu, and Nairobi during the long-rain (April-June), short-rain (October-December), and dry (January-March and July-September) seasons, during 2014â€“2016. The seasons were defined by the average amount of rainfall two weeks prior to mosquito sampling. The data was obtained from the Kenya Meteorological Department and the values were 12.4, 10.8 and 8.3 mm during the long-rains, 5.5, 4.0 and 7.3 mm during the short-rains and 0, 0.3 and 0 mm during the dry season in Mombasa, Kisumu and Nairobi, respectively.
